instructions: You will hear four recordings. Each recording is played ONCE ONLY. You have time to read the questions before each recording. Write your answers as you listen. At the end, you have 10 minutes to transfer your answers to the answer sheet.

parts.title: Everyday Social Conversation
parts.description: A conversation between two speakers in an everyday social context
parts.sample_context: A conversation between a customer and a booking agent about accommodation

parts.title: Monologue in Everyday Context
parts.description: A monologue in an everyday social context (e.g., speech about local facilities)
parts.context: One person speaking about a topic
parts.sample_context: A guide describing features of a museum or facility

parts.title: Educational/Training Conversation
parts.description: A conversation between up to 4 people in an educational or training context
parts.sample_context: Students and tutor discussing a research project

parts.title: Academic Lecture/Monologue
parts.description: A monologue on an academic subject (e.g., university lecture)
parts.sample_context: A lecture on environmental science, history, or business
